meanings.definition: A trolleybus is a bus that is powered by electricity from overhead wires.
meanings.sent1: The trolleybusses in the city are quiet and eco-friendly.
meanings.sent2: I took the trolleybusses to work this morning.
meanings.sent3: The trolleybusses had a party and danced under the electric wires.
meanings.sent4: The trolleybusses hummed along the streets like giant electric snails.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the trolleybusses gliding silently through the streets was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Trolleybusses are public transportation vehicles that run on tracks and are connected to overhead wires for power.
meanings.sent1: Many people rely on trolleybusses to get around the city.
meanings.sent2: The trolleybusses followed the tracks along the main road.
meanings.sent3: The trolleybusses decided to have a race on the tracks.
meanings.sent4: The network of trolleybusses formed a web of electric veins across the city.
meanings.sent5: The trolleybusses moved in unison, like a synchronized dance of electric giants.
